DOC.brief_summary: Abstract . Epidural analgesia safe effective treatment pain childbirth method . Epidural Bupivacaine provide excellent analgesia labor remain widely use local anesthetic obstetric anesthesia . Objective : To evaluate analgesic efficacy two concentration bupivacaine woman labor . Methods : 114 patient include labor term pregnancy . Were group randomly two group : patient receive bupivacaine 0.125 % ( Group A ) 0.25 % bupivacaine ( group B ) . Patients group A receive 10 ml 0.125 % bupivacaine bolus . The patient group B receive 10 ml . Bupivacaine 0.25 % bolus . Pain intensity accord VAS , blood pressure , heart rate , respiratory rate , degree motor block assess use Bromage scale different period time . Results : Demographic characteristic parity compare , statistically significant difference . By compare value VAS measure 0 , 15 , 30 , 60 90 minute statistically significant difference favor group 0.25 % Bupivacaine decrease pain perception 30 minute , p-value find 0.02 . No difference arterial pressure , heart rate respiratory rate find two group . Conclusion : The concentration 0.25 % Bupivacaine great analgesic efficacy compare 0.125 % bupivacaine .
